text: Heaven has frozen over! This creamy-tasting chocolate frozen dessert is chock-full of delicious marshmallow swirls, chopped almonds, and chocolatey chunks.
No artificial colours, prepared from natural sources

Per  1/2 cup   (125 ml)Amount% DVCalories1300%Carbohydrate21g7%Fibre0g0%Sugars16g0%Fat4.5g7%Cholesterol20mg0%Saturated Fat3g15%Trans Fat0g0%Protein1g0%Sodium50mg2%Amount% DVCalcium6%Iron2%Vitamin A0%Vitamin C0%

Modified milk ingredients, sugar, milk ingredients, glucose, coconut oil, water, chocolatey chunks (sugar, coconut oil, cocoa, butter oil, soy lecithin, flavour), almonds roasted in hydrogenated soybean oil and butter, cocoa, pectin, guar gum, mono- and diglycerides, propylene glycol monostearate, cellulose gum, carob bean gum, carrageenan, sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate, artificial flavour, colour. May contain peanuts and other tree nuts.
